mapper.insert: insert into member_tbl values(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPhone}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1, '카카오')
mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, join_type as joinType from member_tbl where member_nickname = #{memberNickname} and member_phone = #{memberPhone}
mapper.insert: insert into member_tbl values(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberPw}, NULL, NULL, NULL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1, '일반가입')
mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, join_type as joinType from member_tbl where member_phone = #{memberPhone}
mapper.update:
update member_tbl set
member_photo = #{memberPhoto},
member_nickname = #{memberNickname},
member_phone = #{memberPhone},
member_city = #{memberCity}, member_intro = #{memberIntro} where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select wm_no as wmNo, wm_title as wmTitle, substr(wm_meet_start, 0, 10) as startdate, substr(wm_meet_end, 0, 10) as enddate from walk_mate_tbl inner join wm_apply_tbl using(wm_no) where member_id = #{_parameter} and apply_stat = 2

select dm_no as dmNo, dm_content as dmContent, to_char(dm_date, 'yy/mm/dd') as dmDate, read_check as readCheck, member_id as receiverId, member_nickname as receiverName, dm_cate as dmCate from dm where sender = #{_parameter} order by dm_no desc

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_city as memberCity, member_photo as memberPhoto, member_intro as memberIntro from member_tbl where member_no = #{_parameter}

select dog_no as dogNo, member_no as memberNo, dog_name as dogName, type_name as dogType, (case type_size when 0 then '소형견' when 1 then '중형견' when 2 then '대형견' END) as dogSize, dog_gender as dogGender, dog_neutral as dogNeutral, dog_vacc as dogVacc, dog_age as dogAge, dog_weight as dogWeight, dog_photo as dogPhoto from dog_tbl d left join dog_type t on (d.dog_type_no = t.type_code) where member_no = #{_parameter} order by dog_no
select wm_title as wmTitle, wm_meet_time as wmMeetTime, wm_addr as wmAddr from walk_mate_tbl where wm_leader = #{_parameter}
